```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```


```{r}
list.files()
```

```{r}
Results_6Feb2023 <-
read_xls(path = '6February2022_eDNA_BdBsal_qPCR_MadrilM.xls', 
         sheet = 'Results',
         skip = 42)

 Metadata_6Feb2023 <-
  read_xlsx("dawson_summer.fall 2022 eDNA data.xlsx",
           sheet = 'Extraction dates') %>%
   mutate("(Extraction) ID" = as.character(`(Extraction) ID`))
```


```{r}
Results_6Feb2023_munged <-
Results_6Feb2023 %>% # This line reads in the results from 6 Feb 2023 
  filter(Reporter == 'FAM') %>% # this line filters only for the FAM reporter
  separate(col = `Sample Name`,
           into = c("Extraction.Type", "(Extraction) ID"),
           sep = "_") 
```

```{r}
Metadata_6Feb2023 %>%
  left_join(y = Results_6Feb2023_munged,
            by = '(Extraction) ID') %>% view()
```
